properties.name: jdecock.security.access-token-lifetime
properties.description: The length of time (in seconds) before an issued JWT expires. The default value is 30 minutes.

properties.name: jdecock.security.refresh-token-lifetime
properties.description: The length of time (in seconds) before an issued refresh token expires. The default value is 7 days.

properties.name: jdecock.security.cookie-secret-key
properties.description: The secret key that is used to encrypt/decrypt http cookies.

properties.name: jdecock.security.cookie-salt
properties.description: The secret key that is used to encrypt/decrypt http cookies.
